DOC.brief_summary: - To Investigate the Prevalence of Capsular Bag Distention Syndrome - To Analyze Influencing Factors of Capsular Bag Distention Syndrome
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study to Investigate Prevalence of Capsular Bag Distention Syndrome and Its Influencing Factors
DOC.criteria: patients who underwent uneventful phacoemulsification and posteriorchamber IOL implantation at the Eye and ENT Hospital of Fudan University, Xuhui, Shanghai, China, between November 2011 and December 2012 Patients with traumatic cataracts or zonular weakness were excluded from the study, as were eyes with intraoperative complications, such as a posterior capsule opening, radial tearing of the continuous curvilinear capsulorhexis (CCC), or inappropriate IOL implantation.
